mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_title, notice_content, notice_type, user_id) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeType}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_type, n.created_at, u.user_id, u.user_nickname, u.user_profile_img FROM notice n LEFT JOIN user u ON n.user_id = u.user_id WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId}
